about._description: Information about the band and its history
about.title: About The Pipes and Drums of the 1st Royal Engineers
about.history: Our history is long and The Pipes & Drums of the 1st Royal Engineers has been our name since 1987, when we became the honorary music corps of Svea Engineer Regiment. The band was founded already in 1968 as The Thistle Pipe Band by Per Colliander, who seriously introduced the Scottish Highland bagpipe to Sweden
specializations: Traditional Scottish melodies and marching music
